description: Extended Kubernetes commands bundle - advanced configuration, storage, and operations

commands.title: Kubectl: Create ConfigMap
commands.description: Create ConfigMap from literal key-value pairs

commands.title: Kubectl: Create ConfigMap from file
commands.description: Create ConfigMap from file contents

commands.title: Kubectl: Get ConfigMap
commands.description: Retrieve ConfigMap configuration in YAML format

commands.title: Kubectl: Describe ConfigMap
commands.description: Show detailed information about ConfigMap

commands.title: Kubectl: Create Secret
commands.description: Create generic Secret from literal values

commands.title: Kubectl: Create Secret from file
commands.body: kubectl create secret generic {{secret name}} --from-file={{file path}} -n {{namespace}}
commands.description: Create Secret from file contents

commands.title: Kubectl: Get Secret
commands.description: Retrieve Secret in YAML format (values will be base64 encoded)

commands.title: Kubectl: Decode Secret value
commands.body: kubectl get secret {{secret name}} -n {{namespace}} -o jsonpath='{.data.{{key}}}' | base64 -d
commands.description: Decode base64-encoded Secret value

commands.title: Kubectl: Create Job
commands.description: Create a Job that runs a container

commands.title: Kubectl: Get Job status
commands.description: Show Job status including completions and duration

commands.title: Kubectl: Create CronJob
commands.description: Create a CronJob that runs periodically - schedule format: minute hour day month weekday

commands.title: Kubectl: Describe Job
commands.description: Show detailed information about Job including history and pods

commands.title: Kubectl: Get StatefulSets
commands.description: List StatefulSets in namespace

commands.title: Kubectl: Scale StatefulSet
commands.description: Scale StatefulSet to specified number of replicas

commands.title: Kubectl: Describe StatefulSet
commands.description: Show detailed information about StatefulSet

commands.title: Kubectl: Get Ingress
commands.description: List all Ingress resources in namespace

commands.title: Kubectl: Describe Ingress
commands.description: Show detailed information about Ingress including routes

commands.title: Kubectl: Edit resource
commands.description: Edit a resource in your default editor - resource type can be deployment, pod, service, etc.

commands.title: Kubectl: Patch resource
commands.description: Apply JSON patch to update specific resource fields

commands.title: Kubectl: Diff changes
commands.description: Show differences between current and desired resource state

commands.title: Kubectl: Apply with prune
commands.description: Apply configuration and delete resources removed from manifest

commands.title: Kubectl: Get PersistentVolumes
commands.description: List all PersistentVolumes in cluster

commands.title: Kubectl: Describe PersistentVolume
commands.description: Show detailed information about PersistentVolume

commands.title: Kubectl: Get PersistentVolumeClaims
commands.description: List PersistentVolumeClaims in namespace

commands.title: Kubectl: Describe PersistentVolumeClaim
commands.description: Show detailed information about PersistentVolumeClaim

commands.title: Kubectl: Get StorageClasses
commands.description: List all StorageClasses available in cluster

commands.title: Kubectl: Apply configuration file
commands.description: Apply Kubernetes configuration from YAML file in specific namespace

commands.title: Kubectl: Delete resource
commands.description: Delete a resource - type can be pod, deployment, service, configmap, etc.

commands.title: Kubectl: Get all resources
commands.description: List all resources in namespace

commands.title: Kubectl: Watch pods
commands.description: Watch pods in namespace with live updates

commands.title: Kubectl: Get pod events
commands.description: Show all events in namespace sorted by timestamp

commands.title: Kubectl: Port forward to service
commands.body: kubectl port-forward svc/{{service name}} {{local port}}:{{service port}} -n {{namespace}}
commands.description: Forward local port to service for direct access
